Package Model.Rules

Class MemeRules

java.lang.Object
Model.Rules.UnoGameRules
Model.Rules.MemeRules
public class MemeRules extends UnoGameRules
This class specializes UnoGameRules to provide the methods of a game mode of UNO created by us Uno meme rules are :
Setup
-the number of cards that can be played in a single turn 3
-the number of cards distributed to each player at the start 11
-the cards with which a deck is composed by classic deck composition with 2 more skip,2 more draw2 ,2 more reverse for each color, 4 more wild and 4 more wild_draw4.(classic deck composition specified in ClassicRules)
In game
-card playability same as classic
-game win condition the first that remains with 0 card left wins the entire match
-card actions performances same as classic but cards are stackable, and the effects sum up
-point scoring there is not scoring, actually the first Player who wins earns 1000 points
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
See Also:
